content.description: Start in the obvious hand crack down and to the right of the first bolt. Fun face climbing (crux) brings you past three bolts to a ledge. Scramble on top of a large block to access the upper slab. Climb past two more bolts to reach the anchor.
content.protection: 5 Bolts, Gear to 2". Mussy hook anchor.
content.location: Approach as for Cyanosis, this route is on the buttress across the gully on the right. Rap or lower off.

content.description: Stem up the short chimney to reach the prominent ledge. Step left and fire the crux. Moderate edging past the final two bolts will bring you to the anchor.
content.location: On the left side of the buttress with Up for the Down Stroke. Start in a short chimney feature. Lower off.

content.description: Start up some steep flakes and follow cracks and corners up to a prominent ledge. Surmount the large bulge via the off width on the left side. Easier crack climbing leads to the anchor.
content.location: Approach as for Cyanosis, this route is on the buttress across the gully on the right. Rap or lower off.

content.description:
Start in a right-facing corner with a small pillar at the bottom. Climb the pillar and corner until the angle backs off and it is possible to traverse left in a hand-size crack around a small cave feature. Proceed up a wider crack in a left-facing corner until a good ledge is reached.

Now the fun begins. Squirm into the squeeze chimney and wriggle your way up past two bolts until the chimney pinches down and you are forced to exit. Climb a final hand crack in the upper left facing corner to reach the anchor ledge.
content.protection: 2 Bolts, Gear to 4". Mussy hook anchor.
content.location: Approach as for Cyanosis, this route is on the buttress across the gully on the right. Rap or lower off.
